sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react';
import './App.css';

import { Icon, Menu, Segment, Button, Label, Grid } from 'semantic-ui-react'

export default class App extends Component {
  state = {
    activeItem: '',
  }

  handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name })
  render() {
    const { activeItem } = this.state
    const shouldExpand = activeItem !== ''
    return (
      <Segment style={{height: '100%'}}>
        <Segment attached='top' style={{height: shouldExpand ? '50%' : '90%'}}>
          <Grid style={{height: '100%'}}>
            <Grid.Column width={12}>
              vis goes here
            </Grid.Column>
            <Grid.Column width={4} style={{height: '100%'}}>
              <Segment style={{height: '50%'}} content='legend' placeholder/>
              <Segment style={{height: '50%'}} content='logs' placeholder/>
            </Grid.Column>
          </Grid>
        </Segment>
        {
          shouldExpand &&
          <Segment attached placeholder={shouldExpand} style={{height: '40%'}}>
            <Label attached='top'

                onClick={() => this.setState({activeItem: ''})}
                content={shouldExpand ? 'Close' : 'Select below to expand'}
            />
            {this.state.activeItem}
            <Segment>
              <Button content={'Parameter 1'} />
              <Button content={'Parameter 2'} />
              <Button content={'Parameter 3'} />
              <Button content={'Parameter 4'} />
            </Segment>
          </Segment>          
        }


        <Segment attached='bottom' style={{height: '10%'}}>
          <Menu>
          <Menu.Item name='crescent step 1' active={activeItem === 'crescent step 1'} onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
            Active Project
          </Menu.Item>

          <Menu.Item name='crescent step 2' active={activeItem === 'crescent step 2'} onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
            Project #2
          </Menu.Item>

          <Menu.Item name='crescent step 3' active={activeItem === 'crescent step 3'} onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
            Project #3
          </Menu.Item>
          </Menu>
        </Segment>
      </Segment>
    )
  }
}
